lead_paragraph: Valencia chairwoman Chan Lay Hoon said the club's owner Peter Lim remained committed to the Spanish side and promised changes after a disappointing campaign that has seen supporters vent their frustrations at the Singaporean billionaire.

headline.print_headline: Valencia Chairwoman Says Changes Coming, Defends Lim
headline.main: Valencia Chairwoman Says Changes Coming, Defends Lim
